overview_of_class: This is the third of a three-quarter sequence of graduate level course on quantum mechanics and its applications to the microphysical world. This quarter we will cover applications of quantum mechanics to atomic and molecular structure, quantum electrodynamics, the interaction of matter and radiation and an introduction to relativistic quantum mechanics.
name: Quantum Mechanics
title: WCAS PHYSICS 412-3-20 Quantum Mechanics
